metadata.rationale: Extracted from canonical script and scene co-occurrence data.

data.description: Dunaway is a sweet, shy, geeky broker in his 20s. He is part of the firm's inner circle of brokers and participates in the VIP room celebration welcoming Dante to the firm. He is socially aware and considerate, as shown by his attentiveness to Yuri.
data.dialogue_summary: Dunaway has two lines of dialogue. In the first, he clarifies the rules of the drinking game to Dante, stating that those who don't own the item in question must drink. In the second, he humorously warns Dante that Joaquin's arrival signals the start of his characteristic show, advising her to brace herself.

explicit_evidence.quote: Dunaway (sweet, shy, geeky broker in his 20s)
explicit_evidence.source_scene: INT. PRIVATE VIP ROOM - GIANT BOOTH - 5PM

explicit_evidence.quote: We see Dunaway placing a flute in Yuri's hand.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: INT. PRIVATE VIP ROOM - GIANT BOOTH - 5PM

explicit_evidence.quote: DUNAWAY: If you don't, you have to drink.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: INT. PRIVATE VIP ROOM - GIANT BOOTH - 5PM

explicit_evidence.quote: DUNAWAY: Herrrrrre comes The Joaquin Show. Brace yourself Dante.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: INT. PRIVATE VIP ROOM - GIANT BOOTH - 5PM
explicit_evidence.trait: aware of firm culture and warns newcomers

inferred_traits.rationale: Dunaway is seated in the central booth with the core brokers and participates naturally in group rituals like the drinking game and champagne toast.
inferred_traits.trait: socially integrated within the broker group

inferred_traits.rationale: He proactively places a flute in Yuri's hand when Yuri appears too weak or disoriented to reach for one himself, showing quiet attentiveness.
He fails to pop the champagne cork and has to pass the bottle along, consistent with his shy and geeky characterization.
He warns Dante about Joaquin's showmanship before it unfolds, indicating familiarity with recurring firm social dynamics.

data.name: DUNAWAY

relationships.evidence: Dunaway is part of the group welcoming Dante to the firm and explains the drinking game rules to her; he also warns her about Joaquin.
Dunaway places a flute glass in Yuri's hand when Yuri appears too weak to reach for one himself.
Seated together in the booth as part of the same broker group at the firm celebration.
Seated together in the booth as part of the same broker group at the firm celebration.
Dunaway recognizes and announces Joaquin's arrival as 'The Joaquin Show', suggesting familiarity and a degree of amusement mixed with deference.
